tool.name: CpptrajBfactor
tool.description: : Wrapper of the Ambertools Cpptraj module for calculating the Bfactor fluctuations of a given cpptraj compatible trajectory.

param.name: input_top_path
param.label: input TOP,PDB,PRMTOP,PARMTOP,ZIP file
param.help: Path to the input structure or topology file. Format: [input].[format]

param.help: Path to the input trajectory to be processed. Format: [input].[format]

param.help: Path to the experimental reference file (required if reference = experimental). Format: [input].pdb

param.name: outname_output_cpptraj_path
param.label: output DAT,AGR,XMGR,GNU name
param.help: Path to the output processed analysis Format: [output].[format]

param.label: cpptraj_path
